parameters: Fade out the screen and show the black bars for the cinematic effect.
Since we aren't using the player, we're going to need to halt
his movement and prevent menu opening, to do this we can simply
use a switch. Without this happening, the player can click to
move the player which will reveal the box-clicky thing
switch to stop movement and prevent opening menu
Change the blank events to mimick our party, set their location, and
make our current party hidden. Uncheck "wait for completion" in set movement
change screens tint and start a screen scroll, then fade in
First, we'll tint it all the way black to make the smooth
Now we fade in the screen to the desired color for 120 frames, or 2 seconds
Move the new party to the left, just before the baddy jumps down
and stops them. Uncheck wait for completion once again and estimate
or playtest to find out how many frames you'll need to wait before
the next action. We want harold to face Therese before she's done moving.
This can also be done in set move rout for harold, but either way works
For therese's last step, we're going to make her walk a bit
We start the dialogue. Make sure the window is transparent, and
you only use the 2 bottom lines of text. We're going to use show
picture to slide in the emotes
-- Start the picture at 734 x and 530 y
Slide it to 730 x and 530 y for about 20 frames, don't wait for
Your majesty, I am Cedric of House Haffenden of Lamar. I believe you - \|\|\^
- sought out help with the recent killings? \|\|\^
Ah yes, I see, you must have been sent by Dormato the new king. I must - \|\|\^
- say I'm surprised that you managed to get here so quickly. It is much - \|\|\^
- appreciated. But let's get straight to the matter. I can't really tell - \|\|\^
- you much about what's going on as we here are not really sure, all we - \|\|\^
- know is that people are being killed throughout the city left, right - \|\|\^
- and centre. I'm asking you to see if you find the source of the problem - \|\|\^
- and then report back to me. I believe I could be in danger. Could you do that? \|\|\^
Slide the picture back to the right a little, and set opacity to 0.
We're going to be doing this for every emote! Make sure to wait 20 frames
before the next dialogue or the pictures will insta-change rather than
Yes, I can try and find the source of the problem for you. I'll have - \|\|\^
Yes, that's understandable feel free to do so as long as it's for the benefit - \|\|\^
- of the kingdom. You need to understand that a lot of people's lives are - \|\|\^
- at risk, including mine. So this is a matter of urgency. \|\|\^
Okay well, I should go and get started. \|\|\^
You obtained Queen Imogene's Entry in the Journal.

I see you have returned Lord Cedric, is there a matter? \|\|\^
No, your majesty, I found the source of the killings. \|\|\^
You did? And what did you find? \|\|\^
It was an assassin I found him lurking around the docks. He didn't give - \|\|\^
- me a chance to talk so I couldn't get much information. However, your - \|\|\^
- city and kingdom should be safer now. \|\|\^
Yes, it should be but I wanted you to bring him to me alive. I wanted to - \|\|\^
- question him myself to understand what was going on. We have no answers - \|\|\^
- and aren’t even sure if he was acting alone is part of a larger organisation. - \|\|\^
- My fears haven’t exactly faded. But you did travel and stop an assassin for me - \|\|\^
- and so Rossmaur will forever be indebted to you. Feel free to come by - \|\|\^
- any time. You have done what others were too scared to do. Thank you. - \|\|\^
- So, what do you plan to do now?  \|\|\^
Slide the picture back to the right a little, and set opacity to 0.
We're going to be doing this for every emote! Make sure to wait 20 frames
before the next dialogue or the pictures will insta-change rather than
Well, I travelled north to make sure my family was safe but now the problems - \|\|\^
- in Luthania are no more. So now I think I’m going to find my brother back - \|\|\^
Ah I see, that sounds like a good plan. Please do be safe on your journey - \|\|\^
- and promise me you will come back. I’d love to see you again Lord Cedric. \|\|\^
You obtained Rossmaur's Entry in the Journal.
Would you like to save game?

Your grace, he’s a rather nice man, isn’t he? \|\|\^
Well, your grace, you are supposed to be looking for a suitor to help extend - \|\|\^
- the family line. If we don’t find someone in time you could be the end of - \|\|\^
- your family line. Your name may change but your blood can continue and - \|\|\^
I think what we’re trying to get across is that Cedric Haffenden is a - \|\|\^
You really think so? He looks a little weak don’t you think? \|\|\^
That’s just his outer appearance, which can easily be fixed. But from what - \|\|\^
- I’ve heard he knows how to hold his own. He has survived the ongoing - \|\|\^
-  troubles in Lamar, Hyde and Rinsar. He helped fix the issue in Luthania. \|\|\^
That’s interesting. He did fix the issue in Luthania. \|\|\^
Not to mention the fact that he seems quite nice as a person. \|\|\^
Yes, that’s true he seems very nice. Keep an eye on him, let us see how he - \|\|\^
- progresses. We don’t want to make any rash decisions. Besides, there’s - \|\|\^
- no point looking for suitors if I could possibly be dead soon. \|\|\^
